channel.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
channel.description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 22 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 15 September 2025 through Monday, 22 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +30, -0

Support increases (30)

API

  1. api âžž CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. api âžž CSSStyleProperties âžž cssFloat
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  3. api âžž Document âžž moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  4. api âžž Document âžž startViewTransition
    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  5. api âžž DocumentFragment âžž moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  6. api âžž Element âžž moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

  8. api âžž GPUDevice âžž importExternalTexture âžž videoframe_source
    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  16. api âžž Performance âžž interactionCount
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  17. api âžž SpeechRecognition âžž phrases
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  18. api âžž SpeechRecognitionPhrase âžž SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  19. api âžž SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  20. api âžž SpeechRecognitionPhrase âžž boost
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  21. api âžž SpeechRecognitionPhrase âžž phrase
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css âžž properties âžž view-transition-name âžž match-element
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http âžž headers âžž Permissions-Policy âžž aria-notify
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  2. http âžž headers âžž Permissions-Policy âžž on-device-speech-recognition
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript âžž builtins âžž Map âžž getOrInsert
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  2. javascript âžž builtins âžž Map âžž getOrInsertComputed
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  3. javascript âžž builtins âžž WeakMap âžž getOrInsert
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  4. javascript âžž builtins âžž WeakMap âžž getOrInsertComputed
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setScreenOrientationOverride
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setLocaleOverride âžž updates_existing_sandboxes
    Added to Firefox  âžž  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 106

Show all 106 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (58)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 12 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api âžž GPUQueue âžž onSubmittedWorkDone

Removed entries (6)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 12 September 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 15 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 8 September 2025 through Monday, 15 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api âžž Document âžž ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  2. api âžž Element âžž ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html âžž elements âžž input âžž type_color âžž accepts_css_colors
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 19

Show all 19 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (10)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api âžž PerformancePaintTiming âžž toJSON
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž auto
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž ideograph-alpha
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  3. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž ideograph-numeric
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  4. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž no-autospace
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  5. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž normal
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  6. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž insert
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  7. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž punctuation
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  8. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž replace
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http âžž headers âžž Supports-Loading-Mode âžž fenced-frame
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

New entries (6)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 5 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api âžž Document âžž ariaNotify
  2. api âžž Element âžž ariaNotify

CSS

  1. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž insert
  2. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž punctuation
  3. css âžž properties âžž text-autospace âžž replace

HTTP

  1. http âžž headers âžž Supports-Loading-Mode âžž fenced-frame

Removed entries (3)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 5 September 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

API

  1. api âžž FederatedCredential âžž iconURL
  2. api âžž FederatedCredential âžž name

HTTP

  1. http âžž headers âžž Supports-Loading-Mode âžž fenced-frames
  • Previous report: Monday, 8 September 2025

item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 1 September 2025 through Monday, 8 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +28, -0

Support increases (28)

API

  1. api âžž DigitalCredential

BCD Metadata Changes: 36

Show all 36 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (15)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 29 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api âžž LargestContentfulPaint âžž renderTime âžž cross-origin

New entries (19)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 29 August 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 25 August 2025 through Monday, 1 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +6, -0

WEBDRIVER

  6. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browsingContext âžž downloadWillBegin_event âžž url_parameter
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 35

Show all 35 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (19)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 22 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.
